alert.note: Alert for Bienville; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 08 at 12:58PM CST until January 08 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Eastern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... South central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1258 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles east of Converse, or 18 miles southeast of Mansfield, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Coushatta, Zwolle, Campti, Converse, Allen, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Martin, Clarence, Goldonna, Ashland, Edgefield, Robeline, Powhatan, Lake End, Belmont, Hanna, St. Maurice, and Pelican. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
